title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
description: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be "Hyperlink Options", but it is changing based on the settings.
OB: When clicking on "OK" and reopening the hyperlink builder, the title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com". 
2. Click on "OK". 
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
